players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: " I am innocent and saw Bob with Charlie last night."
Charlie: "I saw Bob with Charlie last night, and I believe he is innocent. Alice also seemed suspicious to me, but I have no concrete evidence."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
